allow:
Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: clean stale debug binary before building

Add a step to remove any cached fmml_path_debug binaries and bundle
directories before the build. The cache restore-keys fallback was
still restoring stale caches with the old debug binary.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove debug helper entirely

The debug helper was causing build failures due to Tauri bundler
attempting to include it regardless of feature flags. Remove it
entirely rather than fighting with caches and cross-platform issues.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: use universal binary instead of separate x86_64 build

Universal binary includes both arm64 and x86_64, eliminating the need
for a separate x86_64 build. This halves macOS build time and reduces
signing/notarization overhead.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore: add verbose logging to Tauri builds

Enables detailed output for signing and notarization progress.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: prevent keychain auto-lock during macOS builds

Use dedicated keychain password secret and set 1-hour timeout to
prevent keychain from locking during long universal builds. Also
adds find-identity to verify certificate import.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore: limit dependabot to security updates only

Set open-pull-requests-limit to 0 to disable version updates while
still receiving security updates. Prevents unexpected breaking changes
from major version bumps.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
